page.title: 13Braunton-A way of living.
page.content: Braunton people are reasonably wealthy,mainly because of the{tourist} {industry}in summer.A lot of Braunton's population are{retired people}and therefore elderly.There are many small areas that make up Braunton including {Wrafton,Velator and Saunton.}All have large housing estates.Around the village there is a lot of{beautiful {countryside}and this is one of the main reasons Braunton is popular.The majority of people have average size houses,cars and pets-these include dogs,cats,rabbits,hamsters,and tortoises.A lot of people who reside in this area live on their own, and don't have any family in Braunton.The local population,although friendly, tend to avoid tourists,a minority of whom spoil the local area with both litter and at times,noise.
